statements: DELETE FROM ArtworkRecords WHERE artist_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM ArtworkRecords WHERE artist_name = 'Leonardo da Vinci' AND restoration_date <= '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM ArtworkRecords WHERE artwork_title LIKE '%Portrait%' AND restoration_description IS NOT NULL;
DELETE FROM Restoration_Log WHERE restoration_date < '2021-01-01' AND conservator = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM Artworks WHERE artist = 'Leonardo da Vinci';
DELETE FROM Preservation WHERE method = 'Chemical Cleaning' AND start_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Preservation WHERE method = 'Chemical Preservation' AND start_date < '2022-01-01';
